text: Chamarajapuram is a railway station on Mysore-Chamarajanagar branch line. The station is located in Chamarajapuram, Mysore district, Karnataka state, India. ==Location== Chamarajapuram railway station is located near Ballal Circle in K. G. Koppal, Mysore. == History == The gauge-conversion work of the stretch was completed at a cost of . There are six trains running forward and backward in this route. Five of them are slow-moving passenger trains. Railway Station ==References== Category:Railway stations in Mysore district Category:Mysore South
title: Chamarajapuram railway station
